mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Milmore, Martin (American sculptor, 1844-1883) [sculptor]

mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Jacob Bigelow, founder and second president of the Cemetery, commissioned the Sphinx as a memorial for the Union dead, celebrating the end of slavery following the Civil War. -- https://mountauburn.org/sphinx/ ; Inscription: base, American Union Reserved/ African Slavery Destroyed/ By the Uprising of a Great People/ By the Blood of Fallen Heroes [work]
